'''''Crabs for the Crab Throne''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VIII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Emperor of Fire and Iron]] while it is weakened, directly after breaking its Twin Molten Horns.

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is likely a reference to a catchphrase from the miniature wargame ''{{w|Warhammer 40,000}}'', associated with the Chaos Space Marines faction: "Blood for the Blood God, Skulls for the Skull Throne!"
